message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable product that I believe would be highly beneficial to your business. My asking price is $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its worth.  This offer represents a significant value proposition for you, as you've assessed the product's worth at $1,500,000. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.
